p: The medicinal and aromatic plant Hyptis pectinata (L.) Poit. (Lamiaceae), popularly known in the Brazilian northeast as “sambacaitá”, or “canudinho”, has antidematogenic, antinociceptive [ 25], antimicrobial [ 26], insecticide [ 27], anti-inflammatory [ 28], and leishmanicidal [ 29] activities. However, the formicidal activity of the essential oils of this plant has not been studied yet. Thus, results reported in this work enabled the deposit of a patent for the formicidal activity of the essential oils of H. pectinata [ 30].
